scripts.prebuild-deps: pnpm --filter @dooboostore/core build && pnpm --filter @dooboostore/core-node build && pnpm --filter @dooboostore/core-web build && pnpm --filter @dooboostore/dom-render build && pnpm --filter @dooboostore/simple-boot build && pnpm --filter @dooboostore/simple-boot-front build
scripts.dev: pnpm run prebuild-deps && node build.mjs dev --watch
scripts.build: pnpm run prebuild-deps && node build.mjs prod
scripts.preview: node build.mjs && pnpm exec http-server dist
scripts.start:watch: pnpm run prebuild-deps && npm run bundle:watch & npm run serve:watch
